options.description: When `field_type` is either set or enum, possible options must be supplied as a JSON-encoded sequential array of objects. All active items must be supplied and already existing items must have their ID supplied. New items only require a label. Example: `[{"id":123,"label":"Existing Item"},{"label":"New Item"}]`

add_visible_flag.description: Whether the field is available in 'add new' modal or not (both in web and mobile app)
